name: PayXpert for Woocommerce
author: PayXpert

sections.description:
PayXpert is a payment provider company, licensed for Europe through the UK Financial Conduct Authority and carries a financial license for the rest of the world with the Financial Market Supervisory Authority in Switzerland. Learn about our state-of-the-art payment solutions at https://www.payxpert.com/

Support

  • Learn more about PayXpert solutions: https://www.payxpert.com/payments/
sections.installation:
1. Install the plugin like you always install plugins, either by uploading it via FTP or by using the “Add Plugin” function of WordPress.
  2. Activate the plugin at the plugin administration page
  3. Go the that WooCommerce Settings, click on Checkout, you will see a new Checkout Options: PayXpert
  4. Click on the PayXpert Checkout Options, enable the gateway and fill the information provided by PayXpert
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Install the plugin like you always install plugins, either by uploading it via FTP or by using the “Add Plugin” function of WordPress.
  2. Activate the plugin at the plugin administration page
  3. Go the that WooCommerce Settings, click on Checkout, you will see a new Checkout Options: PayXpert
  4. Click on the PayXpert Checkout Options, enable the gateway and fill the information provided by PayXpert

How to create an account?

  • Talk to our experts and get started processing payments worldwide: https://www.payxpert.com/contact/

Questions?

  • Visit our FAQ: https://support.payxpert.com/
  • Developer support team: support@payxpert.com
sections.changelog:
v1.1.2

  • Enforce no-cancel policy for failed transactions

v1.1.1

  • Pay button text as a setting

v1.1.0

  • Iframe option

v1.0.1

  • Get order parameters with methods

v1.0.0

  • Released init version
